subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5618 is on the way

conversations.body_text: Hi Jacob Mauzey,    We apologize for the delayed response—we've just returned from vacation. Here is your shipping tracking link. The product you purchased has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We will ship it to you within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224806142

No thanks, I'll just cancel my order.

On Mon, Jan 12, 2026, 2:57 AM service@simsonn.com

Sending me tracking information on a product you don't have in stock is
shady business. Please cancel my order and send me a refund.
Hi Jacob Mauzey,    Okay, I've canceled it for you.
